meanings.definition: One who interprets or explains texts, especially religious texts.
meanings.sent1: As an exegetist, he delved deep into the meanings behind the scriptures.
meanings.sent2: The exegetist shed light on the complex passages of the holy book.
meanings.sent3: The exegetist playfully compared decoding texts to solving a mystery.
